DOC.brief_summary: The mission project develop novel system care provide efficacious , scalable , cost-effective , participant friendly technology assist behavioral intervention ( TABIs ) treatment depression adult . The investigator define TABIs intervention use information telecommunication technology internet , mobile traditional phone , computer and/or technology support deliver psychological behavioral intervention . Through usability testing , focus interview , field trial , investigator may modify technology intervention base immediate usage data . The goal field trial tailor , test , peer network intervention adult 65 year age old . Two version create test , one one without online social network . The purpose study pilot novel intervention , examine method improve adherence Internet base intervention ( e.g. , peer network ) , ultimately , overcome numerous barrier treat depression later life .
DOC.brief_title: Online Peer Networked Collaborative Learning Managing Depressive Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Has elevate depressive symptom Has telephone , email account , computer , broadband access Internet . Has basic internet skill able access internet independently Is able speak read English . Is least 65 year age . Is able give inform consent . Has hearing voice impairment would prevent participation psychotherapy Has visual impairment would prevent use workbook completion assessment material . Is diagnose psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder , dissociative disorder , current posttraumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) , current substance abuse , diagnosis participation clinical trial psychotherapy may either inappropriate dangerous . Is currently receive individual psychotherapy plan receive psychotherapy 10week treatment phase study ( social networking site ) Is plan town unavailable extended period time study without access Internet Exhibits severe suicidality , include ideation , plan , intent . Has initiate treatment antidepressant past 14 day . Once patient stable dose 14 day appointment physician psychiatrist change dose , patient eligible base criterion .
